div.p: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode where concept is-a _ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType

Exclude these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode
CodeDisplay
_ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType

description.value: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.
